description:
Esplanade in this town that can fit motorhomes and campervan cars. It is dirt but it is level.
Close to San Sebastián and there is not much noise.
Put yourself on the side of the wall better than on the one with the trees since there are more bugs there.

title: (20120) Hernani - 21 Jauregi Bailara
description: Parking y parque del Centro Orona Ideo.

title: (20120) Hernani - 2 Santa Barbara Auzoa
description: Nice quiet parking lot directly below the Sankt Barbara chapel. The driveway is a bit steep but the view is nice (despite the industry). Sloping throughout the area, but possible without ramps with the help of the curb.

title: (20120) Hernani - Segundo Cinturon de San Sebastian Errepidea
title_short: (20120) Hernani - Segundo Cinturon de San Sebastian Errepidea
description: On the A-68 Repsol petrol station itself with an area for emptying gray water, public toilets, and free water filling (low pressure) together with air filling. The taps close to the Aguado drain do not have a hose thread. Great for a stop on the way

address.street: Segundo Cinturon de San Sebastian Errepidea

title: (20120) Hernani - 62W Zikuñaga Bailara
description: It's not the greatest place in an industrial area but it's good enough for one night and quiet.

title: (20120) Hernani - 5 Santa Barbara Auzoa
description: Nook at the edge of a busy road. A wooden bench to enjoy the view. Sloping. No services. Close to the Santa Bárbara climbing spot. Noise from the highway but light at night depending on your insulation. Other nooks are accessible all along the road to the hermitage (chapel). Some a little flatter near the retaurant, for some less sheltered from the wind but with fewer trees hiding the view;)

title: (20115) Astigarraga - 76 Donostia Ibilbidea
description: Good place to visit Astigarraga, level, it is the end of a polygon but very well located downtown 5 minutes walk, near the road but it is not very noisy, we have slept without problem (weekend) something complicated to enter this street of the polygon there Limitation barriers, access x behind the polygon.

title: (20009) Donostia - 172 Oriamendi Pasealekua
description: Gravel parking next to the Ekogune park. Perfect to visit.

title: (20009) Donostia - 172 Oriamendi Pasealekua
description: Place to sleep quietly very close to the Museu Chillida Leku. The area is video monitored, there is a height limit of 2.20m and the upper seats are almost flat, so we have not even leveled the van.

title: (20160) Gipuzkoa - 13W Bidea Illarraltzueta
description: Parking at the back of the cemetery. Slight slope.

title: (20115) Astigarraga - 904 Kale Nagusia
description: Parking next to the cider museum in Astigarraga. Small and somewhat complicated with large motorhome, but if there is room, the place is very quiet and comfortable. Without services. There are also sites in the industrial zone.

title: (20009) Donostia - 53 De Mikeletegi Ibilbidea
description: Parking in the technology park with wide online car parks, ideal for visiting the science museum, we only spent the day, we did not spend the night.

title: (20115) Astigarraga - 130 Santio Zeharra Kalea
description: Parking with four 20m spaces, next to a road with very little traffic. Beautiful view of the mountain (direct) and San Sebastian (close)

title: (20014) Donostia - 910 Miramon Pasealekua
description: Plenty of parking along the street, more for campers. Large mobile homes were also spotted, but a little further towards the stadium, where they were parked parallel to the road. No prohibition signs, fairly quiet/little traffic at night. Park in the immediate vicinity.

title: (20014) Donostia - 926 Miramon Pasealekua
description: Ample parking (although somewhat uneven at some points), ideal for leaving the motorhome to visit San Sebastián. It is the parking lot of the bullring/basketball stadium, not very crowded when there is no match. A short distance away you can take the 28 bus, which goes directly to the center. They come by regularly. Ideal place to visit the city since throughout the city there is a blue zone with limited hours of parking. No AC services.

title: (20014) Donostia - 931 Miramon Pasealekua
description: Service area located under the bridge at the bottom of the car park

title: (20115) Astigarraga - 31 Santio Zeharra Kalea
description: Magnificent parking that is accessed by tracks. It fits a large camper or ac without problem. Although there are slopes to climb do not be scared. It arrives without problem. Worth. I post some photos of the views that are 10 meters from the parking lot. They are the best views of the bay of San Sebastián.

title: (20115) Astigarraga - 20 Sagardotegi Zeharra Aldea
description: Water point opposite restaurant

title: (20009) Donostia - 917 Mikeletegi Pasealekua
description: Quiet parking day and night in Miramon Technology Park

title: (20115) Astigarraga - 6 Petritegi Bidea
description: Parking of the Petritegi cider house, ideal after a night of cider house! But it has permanent free access. Squares flat and some with some inclination. It is near the highway that makes some noise.

title: (20014) Donostia - 68 Alto de Zorroaga Bidea

title: (20130) Urnieta - 22 Errekalde Kalea
description:
it is a very quiet car park. To start the visit of Mount Adarra.

title: (20014) Donostia - 16 Anoeta Pasalekua

title: (20128) Ereñotzu - GI-3410

title: (20014) Donostia - 27 Anoeta Pasalekua
description: Parking on the walk around the stadium. Quiet and shady place. There is a sign that says that on Sundays from 8 to 14 you can't park because they have a market. During the day you have to pay blue zone.

title: (20014) Donostia - 22 Anoeta Pasalekua
description:
Ample paid parking (3.70 euros for 24 hours).
About 10 seats.
City center (old part) just over 2.5 km.
Quiet even to spend the night.

description: Laundry near the Anoeta stadium and the Ilunbe area. Around there are bakeries, supermarket, small food stores.

title: (20009) San Sebastián -

title: (20170) Lasarte-Oria - 923 Lugar Barrio Txikierdi
description: This free parking space for 4 caravans is located next to Urbil Shopping Centre in Usurbil. It's open from 9:30am to 24:00am.

description: Parking Pio XII: Parking lot with height 2.70m about 15min walk from the city centre.

title: (20128) Lugar - 55W Lugar Barrio Ereñotzu
description: Parking for 5-6 cars in a hiking area in the Aiako Harria Natural Park. Very nice and easy walk (when we were there there were several families with children). On the hill, in addition to magnificent views, you can see the Sagastieta Dolmen (there are also others in the area). At the beginning of the path on the right, after about 200m you will reach the Akola picnic area, with several wooden tables, grills and a fountain.

title: (20018) Donostia - 3 Zuatzu Kalea
description: Industrial estate, very quiet

description: Mount higueldo

title: (20009) Donostia - 943 Morlans Pasealekua
description: You can park along the street. Nearby is a gas station.

title: (20170) Donostia - 6 Arrapide Pasealekua
description: Large free parking with shade located 200 m from the town next to horse race track. Only busy on race days. Cycle path to cycle the 8km to San Sebastian beach but this town has plenty of shops and bars anyway.

title: (20014) Donostia - 904 Urumea Pasealekua
description: Street parking, the cheapest area of parking meters, being this green/blue, you pay from 09:00am to 1:00pm and from 3:00pm to 8:00pm, at night you do not pay, walking to the center about 20min.

title: (20009) Donostia - 33 Morlans Pasealekua
description: Parking area on the street. I have parked in a motorhome battery of almost 7m. Fair but it fits. It is paid. It has a lateral inclination, but not very pronounced. There is also a parking area in line, but not very wide. Until the cathedral it is about 20 minutes walking. There is also an option to go by scooter or bike as there is a lane for them.

title: (20009) Donostia - 918 Morlans Pasealekua
description: Parking under a quiet bridge. Blue zone is not expensive throughout the day. It is free from 20h to 09h.

title: (20014) San Sebastián - Mad. Jauregiberri Ibilbidea
description: Small free parking near public transport and 30 minutes walk from the city center. There is also a larger parking lot right next to it under the highway bridge. Convenient to park for free and spend the day in town or on the beach, didn't spend the night there. No height limit but the places are quite narrow.

title: (20130) Urnieta - S/N Barrio Ergoyen
description: Shell gas station for trucks (and cars) with the possibility to take a shower

title: (20018) Donostia - 11 Zarautz Kalea
description: Paid but inexpensive parking. Around 3km from the center lais with line 5 you arrive directly in the old town. Forbidden to sleep there at night, noisy with the road next to it.

title: (20160) Lasarte-Oria - 8 Oria Etorbidea
description: No picture and it's really a shame. SUPER STOP BATHING so I recommend! Just go up the river via the small park, go under the 4 lanes and we land on a beautiful spot for swimming in the wilderness in 5 minutes walk from the car park. Not tested to spend the night but parking that seems quite discreet and protect from the road by a building.

title: (20015) Donostia - 68 Otxoki Pasealekua
description: Unrestricted quiet parking.

title: (20170) Lasarte-Oria - 81 Arrapide Pasealekua
description: Galp gas station with showers

title: (20017) Donostia - 2806 Garbera Bidea
description: Back of the mall. There is some traffic in the early hours. You can park well.

title: (20017) Donostia - 902 Garbera Bidea
description: Parking at the back of a shopping center with a bus stop right next to it, which takes you to the center and to La Concha beach (line 33). Very quiet if you want to visit the city and not enter the center which is crazy, especially in August.

title: (20014) Donostia - 7 Nemesio Etxaniz Kalea
description: Laundromat with large washers and dryers. Close to the marked parking lot and with bars, restaurants and supermarkets next door. Easy to park and have a drink while you wait. A 20 minute walk from the beach along the promenade next to the river.

title: (20009) Donostia - 40 Aiete Pasealekua

title: (20009) Donostia - 25 Lazkano Pasealekua
description: Paid parking along the street

title: (20014) San Sebastián - GI-20
description: Loiola car park - one of several park and ride areas in the city of San Sebastián, without height restrictions, below the motorway bridges. Recommended for overnight stays as a last resort, but recommended for parking the vehicle and visiting the city. Attention: after the driveway you have to go straight on and look for a parking space there, only the left half is free, the right half of the parking lot is exclusively for residents!

title: (20018) San Sebastián -
description: San Sebastian city, blue zone free parking

title: (20008) Donostia - 902 Pío Baroja Pasealekua
description: Sports center with access to showers for 3.9 euros / person. Of the few places that allow entry only for showers.

title: (20018) Donostia - 928 Etorbidea Tolosa
description: Free parking "Igara" for vans. height limit 1 m 90 Bus stop right next door: bus 5. 25 . 45 . takes you to Ondareta beach and La concha (10 minutes.) on foot 2 kms 300 places approximately quiet

title: (20009) San Sebastián - Beloka Pasealekua
description: Paid parking in a residential area 20 minutes' walk from the center of San Sebastián, excellent for vans and mini vans. Super quiet area the parking is uphill and some places have an excessive slope

title: (20009) Donostia - 19-23 Santserreka Pasealekua
description: 20 longitudinal free parking spaces. Residential area, above the sports area. On the route of line 16 (6 mon center), 500 m from the beach, 2km from the center and the old town. View of the vegetation of the sports area.

title: (20017) Donostia - s/n Barrio Alza
description: Big shopping mall car park, accessible to all vehicle heights and well lit up at night. Fairly quiet at night but it gets pretty hectic very early in the morning. Very convenient bus connection (line 33) into town. Underground parking (with CCTV coverage) available as well for vehicles up to 2m height.

title: (20009) Donostia - 3 San Roke Kalea
description: Central site in San Sebastian. We have slept here and everything is ok. Flat but the entrance is a bit narrow depending on the vehicle, it is very close to the center and has beautiful views. It is paid during the day but free from 8pm to 9am.

title: (20008) Donostia - 33 Pío Baroja Pasealekua
description: Nice even parking lot that has spots during the busiest of times.

title: (20018) San Sebastián - 49 Calle de Lautximinieta
description: Free street parking. At night it is emptied of vehicles. Quiet area, few cars at night.

title: (20009) Donostia - 14 Alkainbide Kalea
description: Parking in the street in a green zone in a cozy neighborhood. Up to 9 hours of parking maximum. n zone (blue and green marking) Be careful not to park on resident sites (white marking). Less than 15min from the gardens of Alderdi Eder. Perfect for visiting the old town during the day.

title: (20009) Donostia - 35 Baenako Dukea Pasealekua
description: Parking overlooking the city, very quiet, magnificent view. Benches and grassy area. Free

title: (20018) Donostia - 72 Tolosa Hiribidea
description: Parking space for paid city tour but plenty of space and camper, flat spot no service

title: (20170) Donostia - 14 Abalotz Errepidea

title: (20018) Donostia - 61 Arturo Campion Kalea
description: Fallback of the place by the park is full. Yet, literally nothing around. Parking quite even, fully empty.

title: (20015) San Sebastián - 902 Paseo Otxoki
description: Ample place for all types of AC. Looking for a place to park in the area I found it.

title: (20018) Donostia - 81 Tolosa Hiribidea
description: Laundromat next to the motorhome area in San Sebastian. Nice waiting area with chairs, tables, coffee machine and snack vending machine.

title: (20018) Donostia - 28 Loistarain Kalea
description: Quiet dead end with green areas and quiet little houses. Few places but if you have the chance to find one, we spend a great night just a stone's throw from the bay with our electric bikes.

title: (20008) Donostia - 5 Pío Baroja Pasealekua

title: (20018) Donostia - 70 Tolosa Hiribidea
description: Motorhome, Van and car parking in service road. No view but good access to San Sebastián.

title: (20018) Donostia - 70 Tolosa Hiribidea
description: Motorhome, Van and car parking in service road. No view but good access to San Sebastián.

title: (20015) Donostia - 77 De Mons Ibilbidea
description: Free residential parking area. In August we didn't find where to park to see the city and here there were several places.

title: (20018) Donostia - 1 Manuel Lardizabal Ibilbidea
description: Excellent day and night paid parking when the parking area is full. Recommended by locals

title: (20009) Donostia - 5 Baenako Dukea Pasealekua
description: Some free parking spots close to the beach (800m)

title: (20012) San Sebastián -

title: (20018) Donostia - 107 Illarra Bidea
description: Calm, place for a night when the favourite parking is full. Street is closed by some long time construction work so no traffic. Very quiet.

title: (20007) Donostia - 17 Kontxa Pasealekua
description: Public deposit, with showers and bathrooms. It is at beach level, under the stairs that go from the main street.

title: (20018) San Sebastián - 1 Plaza de Elhuyar
description: The local air just down the road was packed at 4pm and many campers were parked here. Parking under the trees, approx 3m max.

title: (20007) Donostia - 44 De Miraconcha Ibilbidea
description: Spain. Beach preferably

title: (20100) Errenteria - San Marko Gunea Aldea
description: Parking Fort San Marko. Places of the horizontal bottom, on sites in grass Nothing indicates that it is prohibited at night. By obvious to find because roads are closed to traffic: take GI 3671. It goes quite steep and it is not very wide. The fort is visited in summer and it's free beautiful view. A light background noise with the San Sebastian highway in the distance (far enough). Toilet (very clean) and wifi in the fort. Chestnut trees all around the fort :-)

title: (20012) Donostia - 54 Sibilia Kalea
description: Paid parking space within walking distance of the center (30min). Quiet neighborhood, near bakery and supermarket.

name: Area Autocaravanas Donosti
title: (20018) Area Autocaravanas Donosti
description: Donostia-San Sebastián motorhome area. A large space and well connected to the center of Donosti with the 5 or 25 bus and to the center of San Sebastian with the 33 bus.

title: (20018) Donostia - 84 Illarra Bidea
description: Free parking spaces along the road where you can also park with a long camper. Far from the center, it is only good if you don't know where to go.

title: (20100) Listorreta - 54 Aldura Gunea Aldea
description: Parking with picnic tables, and motorhome services. Four dedicated spots for Motorhomes PLUS additional space in large lot.

title: (20018) Donostia - Olarain Kalea
description: Street location near Ondarreta to sleep peacefully

title: (20100) Errenteria - GI-3671
description: Roadside parking without height restriction. Didn't spend the night but saw many vans parked there.

title: (20008) Donostia - 1 Beatriz infantaren kalea
description: Parking, quiet quiet street not bad. Bicycles advised.

title: (20008) Donostia - 4 Ondarreta Pasealekua
description: Public baths / showers hot water. Located below the promenade. WC FACILITIES: 11 (1 disabled) Urinals: 4 Showers: 32 (hot water) 1 for disabled people Lockers: 214 (5 disabled) Rental of shower towels: Yes First aid kit: Yes. HOURS June-September: from 9: 00h. at 8:00 p.m. July-August: from 9:00 a.m. at 8:30 p.m. April-May-October: 10:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. Rest of the year: 10:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.

title: (20018) Donostia - 14 Ondarreta Pasealekua
description:
Parking on the street pay parking meter. Residential and quiet area. 500 metres from the beach and 2 km from the Centre of the city. 
Street parking. Residential and quiet area. 500 meters from the beach and about 2km from the city center

title: (20018) Donostia - 24 Ondarreta Pasealekua
description: Good place to stand, day or night. Also for bigger things. With luck a lot of shade. At night without a ticket.

title: (20008) Donostia - 6 Wiesbaden Kalea
description: Quiet parking in a residential area, it is located 3 minutes from the beach and the showers place.

title: (20008) Donostia - 20 Igeldo Ibilbidea
description: Great place if you are lucky enough to find free to leave the camper and enjoy the beach or a trip around the city.

title: (20013) Donostia - 73 Ategorrieta Hiribidea
description: For small vans less than 5.40 m. long. It is a small area next to the N1 main road, just behind the kiosk and at the entrance to the Ortzadar Ikastetxea, close to homes and a 15-minute walk from Gros beach. Throughout the day it is difficult to find parking.

title: (20170) Usurbil - 38 Kalezar Auzoa
description: Quiet place next to a soccer field to park and spend the night. It is ideal if you want to enjoy Guipuzcoan gastronomy, since it is at the entrance of the Sidrería Saizar.

title: (20003) Donostia - 1 De la Brecha Enparantza
description: Parking near the center of San Sebastián. Can accommodate up to 2.20m in height. We were in autocamp xl van traffic with pop-up roof. This happened :)

title: (20001) Donostia - s/n De Cataluña Plaza
description: Parking garage 2.20m high - so bullis can easily drive in - a bit expensive but monitored and perfect for exploring the city.

title: (20003) Donostia - 4 San Lorenzo Kalea
description: C / San Lorenzo 6. Laundry with 3 washers and 2 dryers. It has a change machine. Very clean and recommended.

title: (20015) Donostia - 283 Alcalde J. Elosegi Hiribidea
description: Parking of the football stadium "Cesar Benito". Free, ideal for a day visit (not sleeping) of the old town (about 15 minutes by bike)

title: (20002) Donostia - 2 General Artetxe Kalea
description: Speed Queen Laundromat Much cheaper than the one on the west side! 8:00 a.m. - 9:00 p.m. 9 kg for 5.50 20 kg for 10 EUR Dryer 4 EUR for 30 min

title: (20008) Donostia - 9 Eduardo Chillida Pasealekua
description: Street in front of the sea. Water available right in front of the beach and shower available on the beach (cold) or for a fee otherwise in toilet area.

title: (20003) Donostia - 8 Salamanca Pasealekua
description: Short parking of 1 hour and 30 minutes, expensive, without the possibility of extending the stop. Very close to the city center and the beach for a very short visit.

name: Camping Igara
title: (20018) Camping Igara
description: Small camping. the equipment is paid : pool, weight room, sauna and hammam (we have not tried). The pitches are small.

title: (20013) San Sebastián - Zemoriya Kalea
description: Very quiet spot close to Zurriola Hondartza beach in the hip area of Gros. We slept really well. Mind you, during the day our van got opened and we got robbed. So make sure to take your belongings with you if you leave the car there during the day.

title: (20003) San Sebastián - Pasealeku Berria 6
description: A lovely place to park during the day and night. make sure you pay at the parking meters as the parking wardens are very attentive with cctv in the car to read the number plates very busy if you can park its a lovely walk into the old town very quiet at night no hassle worth it stay (from now on thanks to the behavior of some who used it as a campsite, you can no longer park from 9:00 p.m. to 9:00 a.m. so you can only spend the day and at night you have to go to other declared areas city like Ilunbe or the University)

title: (20016) Donostia - 903 Paseo Serapio Mugica
description: We found this parking for day or night, it's in a neighborhood next to Eroski & a bar. there's a park for the dog if you have one.

title: (20110) Pasaia - 0 Euskadi Hiribidea
description: Area next to the center with free places

title: (20170) Usurbil - 911 Paseo Gernika
description: Parking in the center of town, in front of the sports center. It has several places. We have spent the night without any problem. Next there is a dog camp. Source outside the sports center.

title: (20003) Donostia - Pasealeku Berria
description: Incredible views. Plenty of space to park during the day, you can no longer stay overnight. No parking from 9:00 p.m. to 9:00 a.m., residents only. Keep in mind that you can only park in the blue zone, from the lamppost that has a sign to the rear. The white zone is for residents and they are fined.

title: (20003) Donostia - 5W Subida Castillo
description: Very pleasant but paying and rather expensive for 3 hours in April. nice to stop and eat.

title: (20008) Donostia - 2 Kristobal Balenziaga Kalea
description: Spot for van without amenities because impossible to park in Donostia San Sebastián. Direction Igeldo, parking near the Hotel Leku Eder Possibility to take a shady path to reach the beach approx 1.7 kms or bus

title: (20013) San Sebastián - 28 Calle Jose Miguel Barandiaran
title_short: (20013) San Sebastián - 28 Calle Jose Miguel Barandiaran
description:
Parking very well located in playa de Gros.
Parking of 3 hours maximum during the day.
Prohibited to park from 9 p.m. to 9 a.m. (Fine from 9 p.m.).
The beach toilets are very clean but only open at 9am.

title: (20017) Donostia-San Sebastian - 922 Darieta Bidea
description: Public car park (flat), next to the new Alza Sports Center. ONLY OVERNIGHT. Suitable for minicampers and small cars. 2m height limit. It is not usually crowded. Lamps around but with the blinders, solved. Trash cans nearby. Views of Peñas de Aia, San Marcos and surrounding mountains. The best, the sunrises.

title: (20110) Pasaia - 10D Herrera Kalea
description: With views of the Port and next to Pasaia, 2min from the center, the parking lot is large and there is nothing that prohibits parking

title: (20013) Donostia - 297 Ulia Pasealekua
description: Hostel parking. North east of Donostia in a large, quiet natural park, long winding road to access but silence assured. No services Pecision on access. It is best to take from the city centers Alcade J Elogesi Hiribidea in the East> West direction and turn right at the Hotel Guna. You ride a long time through a residential area and narrow road. I passed with a 6.30 m but longer must be possible despite delicate crossing. Do not take by the seaside (road coming from the North) because I do not guarantee accessibility.

title: (20016) Pasaia - 17 Azkuene Kalea
description: Self service laundry.

title: (20110) Pasaia - Ámbito Portuario Kalea
description: Ample parking for all types of vehicles. Next to the port. Is free. We have slept two nights without problems and without noise. No shade and asphalt floor. Overnight is allowed but not camping. San Pedro neighborhood and near San Juan neighborhood.

title: (20110) Pasaia - 102 Esnabide Kalea
description: Street leading to "San Pedro de Pasaia" free parking on one side of the street or parking port, not bad passage of pedestrians, cars and trucks but in the night much less passage, I advise you to go visit the old town to the mouth of the port is beautiful. restaurants, bars, boardwalk, hiking, fishing, wooden boat building visit at the end of the promenade, possibility to cross the harbor by boat for round trip to visit a beautiful place in front, "Pasai Donibane "superb view in the heights, shady corners etc ... water point on the square (city side), children's playground, restaurants, banks, bars, bakeries and small supermarket" Dia "The photos come from the promenade of port and his little boat that makes us cross.

title: (20170) Usurbil - 3 Diseminados Usurbil Barreiatua
description: Water fountain and 10 parking spaces

title: (20008) Donostia - 1 Lizardia Enparantza
description: Parking next to a school. It's Sunday and the patio is open, it has swings. Shadows and very quiet. On the street below, a children's park and toilets.

title: (20170) Usurbil - 4 Errekaldea Kalea
description: Behind an industrial area along the river ... has very quiet shade. Perfect for a picnic pose I think we could spend the night there but not tempted ..

title: (20008) Donostia - 2 Padre Orkolaga Ibilbidea
description: Fairly large and quiet parking lot, sea view.

title: (20008) Donostia-San Sebastian - 904 Padre Orkolaga Ibilbidea
description: Parking next to the cemetery, slightly sloping, great view, next to the road.

title: (20140) Andoain - 15 Extremadura Kalea
description: Parking without services in the upper part of Andoain. Level. Very calm. Easy access. Close to the cycle route.

title: (20140) Andoain - 19 Kale Nagusia Kalea
description: DO Laundry self-service laundry

title: (20140) Andoain - Txistoki Pasealekua Ibilbidea
description: Very quiet parking in town. Good access from the N1 and easy to park. Services of all kinds within walking distance (supermarket, greengrocer, butcher, cafeteria...) Perfect for spending a night, stocking cupboards and getting to know Andoain and the Leizaran natural park and its 25 km greenway by bike. You cannot park on Tuesday and Saturday mornings as there is a market.

name: wecamp San Sebastian
title: (20008) wecamp San Sebastian
description: wecamp San Sebastian, located about 300 meters above sea level. In part of the campsite there are mobile-homes and plots for campers and glamping tents. The plots are 60m2 where all types of caravans and motorhomes fit. Plus and Premium pitches include electricity.

title: (20140) Andoain - 1 Sorabilla Auzoa
description:
Parking in the polygon,
access to the town in 5'.
No services.
Close to the highway, a bit noisy.
Little fuss on the weekend,
midweek things will change!!!!

title: (20100) Errenteria - 51 Lousada Kalea
description: We spent a night without problems and quiet and that was the parties of Errenteria.  It's a bit far from the center on the way out, it's all downhill… the return is a little harder hehe.

title: (20008) Donostia - 69 Padre Orkolaga Ibilbidea
description: Annex to the campsite for motorhomes and campers. Ask at the We camp camping reception. It is not always open. Grassy area. Shims may be needed to elevate depending on the plot. Spaces a little fair for large motorhomes. Something cheaper than camping pitches. To take the public bus from the campsite stop, download the d-bus app and it will tell you the bus arrival time at the stop. Very practical.

title: (20170) Usurbil - 13 Urdaiaga Auzoa
description: Very quiet picnic area with about 15 relatively level places for motorhomes <6m. Approach relatively steep but fixed. Great view of the hilly landscape. Very quiet except for the nearby church bell.

title: (20110) Pasai Donibane - 1 Ámbito Portuario Kalea
description: Nice parking for motorhomes and large vans. Close to Pasaia. Right next to the port. In the evening it was really quiet, from morning there are cars coming down the street. It is very urban, there is no grass etc. but helps for the day/night. In the night it felt safe.

title: (20110) Pasai Donibane - 2 Lezo-Bide Kalea
description: Parking very quiet above the port and 5 minutes walk from the old town and bars restaurants. Is located in the middle of the coastal hike that goes from Hondarribia to San Seb. A river shuttle provides access to the other side. Not suitable for vehicles over 6m long.

title: (20110) Pasai Donibane - 3 Jose Joakin Otaegui Plaza
title_short: (20110) Pasai Donibane - 3 Jose Joakin Otaegui Plaza
description: Water fountain in the pediment, located on the side of the track.

title: (20170) Usurbil - 906 Lugar Barrio Urdaiaga
description: Shaded picnic area

title: (20110) Pasai Donibane - 9W Donibaneko Pasealekua
description: Good place to leave the motorhome, visit the old part of Donibane, go to San Pedro by boat.

title: (20140) Andoain - 2 Txitibar Plaza
description: Self-service laundry with washing machines and dryers. There is also a dog washing station. Open Monday to Sunday 8AM-22PM. Supermarket, bars and restaurants around.

title: (20100) Lezo - GI 2638
description:
Not very picturesque, no services, but free and rather calm. Occasionally there is noise from the nearby trains, but ut didn't bother us. 
It's a good base to sleep and leave the car and go for a hike.

title: (20170) - 902 Lugar Barrio Urdaiaga
description: Parking next to a river in a small village. Railway tracks next door. A lot of nature.

title: (20100) Lezo -
description: Free day and night parking along and at the end of the dead end, quiet corner

title: (20180) Oiartzun - 5 Talaia Poligonoa Poligonoa
description: Parking in the polygon next to a river with a promenade and a greenway. It also has a picnic area. Peaceful place

title: (20140) Andoain - 53W Leizotz Auzoa
description: Parking giving access to the Leizaran valley. Ideal for mountain biking and fishing.

title: (20110) Pasaia - 3 Arrokaundieta Bidea
description: Shaded picnic area with tables and benches, and small walking paths

title: (31754) Arano -
description: Parking at the edge of the road to access the Urumea river, about 6 cars. calm

title: (20180) Oiartzun - 910 Uretxe Poligonoa
description: Parking well located to visit Errenteria. To sleep there are other places nearby quieter.

title: (20008) Donostia - 151 Padre Orkolaga Ibilbidea
description: Small area at the end of a dead-end track near the summit of a hill. Surrounded by antennae but otherwise a great view.

title: (20110) Pasaia - Bonanza Ibilbidea
description: At the intersection of the road and a path. Small flat place to spend the night. 2/3 places, no service, quiet and in the shade of pines. Parking further for garbage cans. Possibility of going down to the port of Pasajes by the paths.

title: (20180) Oiartzun - 3 Lintzirin Poligonoa Poligonoa
description: Repsol service station with paid showers with car wash also for campers, you can also wash the roof, well-cleaned service station toilets and the possibility of filling up water (not drinkable).

title: (20180) Elizalde - 4A Sibeluts Kalea
description: Large parking next to the cemetery. Green areas to walk.

title: (20110) Gipuzkoa - 7W Lugar Jaizkibelbidea
description: Small gravel parking next to the road; view on sheep, donkeys, horses and a small pico nearby. Very quiet and clean.

name: Camping Oliden
title: (20180) Camping Oliden
description: Super small camping on grass with shade, a nice small pool, beautiful sanitary very clean Well defined locations Friendly home

title: (20100) Lezo -
description: Small place, for a van. The part on the right is flat, on the left it is rocky and uneven. You can maneuver inside, but it's better if you go in from behind. No services.

title: (20100) Lezo - 47 Ipintza Kalea
description: Cheap gas station, free water refill, shower

title: (20170) Aginaga - Unnamed Road
description: Amazing Spot near San Sebastián.. ocean’s view

title: (20180) Altzibar-Karrika - 2Y Altzibar Poligonoa
description: Parking next to a stream, in a neighborhood with shops, bar, restaurant ..... quiet place with places to walk. Pass the bidegorri right next to it.

title: (20150) Villabona - 7C Agaraitz Auzoa Auzoa
description: Cepsa service station. Open 24 hours. Small Carrefour supermarket and clean toilets. Showers

title: (20008) Donostia -
description: 4x4 access only. Wilderness bivouac under pine trees. 10 meters from a winding and brittle path. Superb ocean view.

title: (31754) -
description: 25km south of San Sebastian, towards Goizueta, it is an area on the banks of the Rio Urumea. Calm night assured. Swimming for the more adventurous.

title: (20810) - 8 Lugar Benta Aldea
description: Orio-Igeldo picnic area, we stopped for the dogs, it is a picnic area, today it is raining and there is fog, but you can see the sea. on an asphalt road , narrow but in good condition, there is enough space for a motorhome. Very quiet and very close to San Sebastián. There are tables to eat and a grill in the middle. also toilets, but today they are closed.

title: (20180) - Camino Artikutzako
description: Perfect parking for a picnic with views of the mountains and meeting with wild horses, cows.

title: (20150) Villabona - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area "Komizar" with picnic tables and barbecues. Narrow paved road.

title: (31754) Latse - Aldura Gunea Aldea
description: Very quiet place, access to the water reservoir for a walk. space for several vehicles

title: (20150) Villabona - 35X Lugar Barrio Otelarre
description: Esplanade of land next to the door of the Hika Winery. The winery is visited and they are very friendly. Space for more than 20 vehicles with no clearance limit.

title: (20110) Pasaia - 9 Jaizkibel Hiribidea
description: Parking in a quiet street. Almost uniform. Almost 400 meters high.

title: (20180) - 1 Maldaburu Bidea
description: Rest area with plenty of parking space. There are parking lots for trucks, and cars and trailers are close to the autogrill. They have showers and bathrooms, but they close at midnight.

title: (20810) - 18W Lugar Ortzaika Aldea
description: Parking on the right from St Sébastien between the wine cellar and a restaurant opposite the parking below, already mentioned

title: (20150) Zizurkil - 17 Ernio Bidea
description: Quiet parking for the night and day. gravel parking, is level, has street lighting and garbage containers. shops, bars and square 100 meters

title: (20810) Orio - Lugar Ortzaika Aldea, 901
description: 10 dedicated motorhome spaces provided by council in small car park just of main road. No black or grey dump but steps down to River and a drinking water fountain. Very handy base to walk or cycle along pretty river path to Orio town or on further to beach.  2 night max stay. Restaurant and waste bins opposite.

title: (20810) Orio -
description:
Very quiet place and spectacular location
Along the way there are areas where you can park well

title: (20159) - 909 Lugar Zizurkil Nucleo
description: Parking at the entrance of Zizurkil Arriba. Very quiet, next to a church and the road. Few noises at night, cars do not usually pass, except at rush hour when there is a bit more hustle and bustle. Have we ever seen motorhomes stay overnight as well. Good views.

title: (20180) - GI-3631
description: Outdoor parking with departures for hikes and possible take-off for paragliders. A little more exposed to the winds than the previous parking lot on the same road. Very nice view of San Sebastian with sunset. Several flocks of sheep around which woke us up in the early morning.

title: (20150) Villabona - Legarreta Auzoa
description: Beautiful, quiet park with shops and bars to visit, bike path and the train station nearby to visit San Sebastian.

title: (20810) Orio - Barreiatua
description:
Along a small quiet road and the river.

/!\ Saw a police car during the day who told us not to spend the night there.

title: (20100) Lezo - 27 Gaintxurizketa Goikoa Bailara
description: Sloping parking lot with nice noise view in the valley of cars

name: Autocaravan park txingudi
title: (20305) Autocaravan park txingudi
description: Forget the rush and book in advance. Service area and parking for motorhomes guarded 24 hours by video surveillance and security guard. It has 44 places with an approximate area of 25m2 each. All seats have electrical outlet. Drinking water intake, gray and black water discharge point are also offered. Garbage containers (urban waste, plastics, paper and cardboard). Overnight maximum 48 hours. Located in a strategic place close to the municipalities of Hondarribia, San Sebastián, Irun, Biarritz, Bayona..., to discover the character of the Basque people, its history, culture and gastronomy. Place near the border of France, next to the exit of the AP-8. Ideal for users who are passing through to the south of Spain or north of Europe. Point to refuel, rest and continue. Close to excellent hiking trails, stages of the Camino de Santiago, BBT routes. Close to the sea where you can enjoy the beaches and water sports. Perfect to enjoy the sea, the mountains and the city. Book in advance, easy and simple. Rate: €20/24 hours (check in: 12:00 check out 12:00). All included, filling and emptying service and electricity. Rate: €15/24 hours (check in: 12:00 check out 12:00). Including filling and emptying service.

title: (20180) Oiartzun - GI-3631
description: Small parking lot, for van and van. 4G Sosh

title: (20810) Orio - 901 Etorbidea Aita Lertxundi
description: Unlimited public parking, in front of the river, public bathrooms leaving the parking lot towards the river promenade next to the exercise machine park.

name: Iskibi Kanpina
title: (31754) Iskibi Kanpina
description: iskibi camping

title: (20180) Ergoien - 1 Arditurri Bidea
description: Gravel area on the edge of the road, next to the river. Space for one, although a little further on there is a parking lot.

title: (20810) Orio - 44 Abaromendi Kalea
description: Municipal parkplace with dedicated places for camping-cars. Good access to the beach, restaurant nearby.

title: (20809) Aia - 1 Arratola Aldea Auzoa
description: Parking under train station right next to the bridge that leads to the bar area. Suitable for vans. Public bath in the same street. Gratuitous.

title: (20810) Orio - 12 Ibai-Ondo Ibilbidea
description: Self-service laundry

title: (20280) Hondarribia - GI-3440
description: Roadside parking ideal for a night with its magnificent life at sunset ☀
